Author: thinconflictions
Text: Thanks for your support. It's nice hearing someone else's rational thoughts about this. It was indeed a denim jacket so I'll try to cut myself some slack :)

Author: fatpigeon_
Text: I’m assuming it’s denim because of the brand, and if it is, denim is the biggest bitch fabric for fitting to your usual sizing and measurements. Most good quality stuff is 100% cotton, meaning no stretch. It’s not your fault, it just fits on bodies differently because it’s so thick and stiff.  My best fitting pair of jeans has 2 inches more on the waist than other trousers I wear, it bothered me so much I ripped the back sizing tag off.
